Posts.Content: i have had a lumpectomy with grade three cancer in the breast but all my nodes are clear. i had chemo and radiation because my cancer was very agressive and i was prescripbed tamoxifen for 5 yrs. my 5 years finished two weeks ago and my specialist has discharged me and said he does not have to see me again, i was not prescribed any more theraphy because the benefit to me is only about 1%-after 5 years of being looked after and regularly seeing my doctors and taking tamoxifen, all of a sudden i felt alone and i have this feeling of what next? i have no one to turn to to tell me or share their experiences how is life after treatment? what and how do i feel? does my body start functioning normally again? what happened to my hormones? do i suffer withdrawal from tamoxifen? and for how long while my body adjust to not taking the pills? can anybody help me and give me feed back please.
Posts.Title: Life After Treatment and Tamoxifen
